Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Virtue is the fount whence honour springs

Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Money can't buy love, but it improves your bargaining position

Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: What are kings, when regiment is gone, but perfect shadows in a sunshine day?

Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Live and die in Aristotle's works

Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Jigging veins of rhyming mother wits

Quote.Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote.QuoteValue: While money doesn't buy love, it puts you in a great bargaining position

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: There are three ingredients in the good life: learning, earning and yearning

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: Act like you expect to get into the end zone

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: No man is lonely eating spaghetti; it requires so much attention

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: The bicycle, the bicycle surely, should always be the vehicle of novelists and poets

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: In every man's heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: The misfortunes hardest to bear are these which never came

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a foreign language; all men mispronounce it

Quote.Author: Christopher Morley
Quote.QuoteValue: High heels were invented by a woman who had been kissed on the forehead

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love photographing things and putting them together to tell a story

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: If I could steal someone's dream myself, I'd have to go for one of Orson Welles

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: The best actors instinctively feel out what the other actors need, and they just accommodate it

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a movie guy, movies have been my thing. I love movies, all kinds of movies

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: By the time I was 10 or 11, I knew I wanted to make films

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: I never considered myself a lucky person. I'm the most extraordinary pessimist. I truly am

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: The only job that was ever of interest to me other than filmmaking is architecture

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never read Joseph Campbell, and I don't know all that much about story archetypes

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I've only ever done one film at a time

Quote.Author: Christopher Nolan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm taking a bit of a wait-and-see attitude towards 3D

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: Either you decide to stay in the shallow end of the pool or you go out in the ocean

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important to me to say what I really mean

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: Never accept ultimatums, conventional wisdom, or absolutes

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: You play the hand you're dealt. I think the game's worthwhile

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned years ago to come to terms with having so much done for me by others

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: Your body is not who you are. The mind and spirit transcend the body

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though I don't personally believe in the Lord, I try to behave as though He was watching

Quote.Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote.QuoteValue: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: At its best, life is completely unpredictable

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to worry about things I can't do anything about

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not much of an analyzer or a psychologist

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: Because if I don't know my lines, I really don't know what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: I live sort of in the country and I like that. It's very quiet, it's beautiful

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: My hair was famous before I was

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: Emotional power is maybe the most valuable thing that an actor can have

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: Is typecasting really a problem?

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: I make movies that nobody will see. I've made movies that even I have never seen

Quote.Author: Christopher Walken
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need to be made to look evil. I can do that on my own

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: My day-to-day life changes; I don't have any standard day

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: America's health care system is the most complicated and expensive in the world

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather go naked than wear fur

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a beer belly

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: I sincerely feel that beauty largely comes from within

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: I would be very proud to have influenced anyone that I know or don't know to quit smoking

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: Modeling is a profession where your worth is tied up with looks

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: Sacred spaces can be created in any environment

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: Yoga gave me the ability to calm down

Quote.Author: Christy Turlington
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a son and a daughter; I try to teach them equally about balance, gender, and gender equity

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing how much you can learn if your intentions are truly earnest

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Rock's so good to me. Rock is my child and my grandfather

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't let the same dog bite you twice

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, your ears record. You might can sing a song once you hear it

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Praise doesn't mean anything to me. I don't judge myself

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want the bottom, so I have to sacrifice the top

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to release your aggression, get up and dance. That's what rock and roll is all about

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I would sing the blues if I had the blues

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: My singing days have passed. My voice is gone. My throat is worn. And my lungs are going fast

Quote.Author: Chuck Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is science. Everything is science. Because science is truth

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't work with inspiration. Inspiration is for amateurs. I just get to work

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: Never let anyone define what you are capable of by using parameters that don't apply to you

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm plagued with indecision in my life. I can't figure out what to order in a restaurant

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: Every child should have a chance to feel special

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: Painting is the frozen evidence of a performance

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something Zen-like about the way I work - it's like raking gravel in a Zen Buddhist garden

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: Ease is the enemy of the artist. When things get too easy, you're in trouble

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always a pleasure to talk about someone else's work

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very learning-disabled, and I think it drove me to what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Chuck Close
Quote.QuoteValue: All the fingerprint paintings are done without a grid

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I fervently believe that education is the key to moving forward

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always believed in local government

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all still kids when it comes to baseball

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: We've got to look at waste, fraud, and abuse across the board

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved small business

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes time for 700,000 people to get to know their congressman

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: We won the Cold War because we showed nuclear vigilance and diligence

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a dangerous world, and Russia has not complied with existing treaties

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a can-do conservative, and I just love the job, and I think I'm going to get re-elected

Quote.Author: Chuck Fleischmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear frayed khaki pants

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: Good things happen to those who hustle

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: A life of frustration is inevitable for any coach whose main enjoyment is winning

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: Pressure is something you feel when you don't know what you're doing

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: Never make a major decision based solely on money

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: Mamas, don't let your sons grow up to be Cowboys... or Oilers

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: Some coaches pray for wisdom. I pray for 260-pound tackles. They'll give me plenty of wisdom

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone's job is important, but no one is indispensable

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: Before you can win a game, you have to not lose it

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: The thrill isn't in the winning, it's in the doing

Quote.Author: Chuck Noll
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not pleasant when you lose your whole football team

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are like steel. When they lose their temper, they lose their worth

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: Violence is my last option

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't initiate violence, I retaliate

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime you get action legends together, it has to be a classic

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you can learn from history

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a people's actor, not a critics' actor, and I always have been

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: Good morals lead to good laws

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: I was just a start-and-stop guy. I could never really follow through on anything that I started

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Christians and Muslims should hug each other

Quote.Author: Chuck Norris
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether we are famous or not, we all need God. We also need other people

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: The lower you fall, the higher you'll fly

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: The only difference between suicide and martyrdom is press coverage

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: When did the future switch from being a promise to a threat?

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: What we don't understand we can make mean anything

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: People have to really suffer before they can risk doing what they love

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: Only through destroying myself can I discover the greater power of my spirit

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody's told me anything to date that I've been completely reviled by

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: A film has to maintain a certain decorum in order to be broadcast to a vast audience

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will

Quote.Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the past seems too big for the present to hold

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: I think teaching should be an exalted profession, not a picked-on profession

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: When someone takes a private photo, on a private cell phone, it should remain just that: private

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: Giving up even an ounce of precious freedom is a very serious thing to do

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: America is a place where we all come together. It is a place of consensus

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: Mr. Snowden is a coward who has chosen to run

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: In today's competitive economy, to stand still is to die

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: Inaction is perhaps the greatest mistake of all

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: When one has success, the answer is not to undo that success. It is to continue what has been done

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: Democrats don't relate to middle-class people

Quote.Author: Chuck Schumer
Quote.QuoteValue: If we say the Geneva Convention is obsolete, then what do others who have our soldiers say?

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't embrace who you are and accept who you are, you won't be able to live a happy life

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: Cute accessories always help bring out your outfit and pull it all together

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to stay happy, and I like to live life light and make the best of life

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: More than anything, I realize I've been blessed to make great music

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: If a person uses the word 'sorry' loosely then of course it loses its value

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it takes a lot of confidence to be comfortable in being vulnerable

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not totally innocent, and I do date. But as a young woman, I also demand respect

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: I was so driven that sometimes you don't recognise all the good things that are happening to you

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to sound too cocky. But I consider myself superwoman

Quote.Author: Ciara
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a mom has changed me forever

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: I intend to grow old very disgracefully

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: I just thank God when I wake up every day

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: I never did acid, I am just so high anyway

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: I helped make the Sixties swing, and I'm very proud of that

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to watch your life unfold, and sad. Life changes

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't say I'm surprised I was successful. I was determined - and I got it

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: I humbly apologise for reality Television

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: But reality television is here to stay

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: The difference with me is that I did inhale

Quote.Author: Cilla Black
Quote.QuoteValue: It was an unknown thing, a lot of people had very bad trips and I like to be in control

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is the greatest answer to my loneliness that I have found

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you get over that peak of puberty, you hit a nice stride

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: Counterterrorism isn't really about the nunchakus, the guns and gadgets. It's about psychology

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: I do know how to fire a machine gun, so be warned! I'm trained!

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: I really have never been concerned about being beautiful on-screen. That's just not my jam

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: People with bipolar disorder have difficulty with boundaries

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: Any story is better with a little love in it, right?

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: I should be so lucky to be a misfit. I aspire to be a misfit

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up, I wanted desperately to please, to be a good girl

Quote.Author: Claire Danes
Quote.QuoteValue: I know, it's true. I've played these tortured teenagers. I can't wait to shed that image

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: No good deed goes unpunished

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, that's the only good thing about divorce; you get to sleep with your mother

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: The politicians were talking themselves red, white and blue in the face

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: A man's home may seem to be his castle on the outside; inside is more often his nursery

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: Censorship, like charity, should begin at home, but, unlike charity, it should end there

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: The oppressed never free themselves - they do not have the necessary strengths

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman's best protection is a little money of her own

Quote.Author: Clare Boothe Luce
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing like a good dose of another woman to make a man appreciate his wife

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: True patriotism hates injustice in its own land more than anywhere else

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a boy I was told that anybody could become President; I'm beginning to believe it

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: History repeats itself, and that's one of the things that's wrong with history

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with law is lawyers

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only protect your liberties in this world by protecting the other man's freedom

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only be free if I am free

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a friend of the working man, and I would rather be his friend, than be one

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Laws should be like clothes. They should be made to fit the people they serve

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never killed a man, but I have read many obituaries with great pleasure

Quote.Author: Clarence Darrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an agnostic; I do not pretend to know what many ignorant men are sure of

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: Good manners will open doors that the best education cannot

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: And I thank God I believe in God, or I would probably be enormously angry right now

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: You didn't think of angels as white or black. They were angels

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: My grandparents had died in 1983, and suddenly my brother is out jogging before Mass, and he dies

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd been very partial to Malcolm X, particularly his self-help teachings

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to really be partial to Ayn Rand, and to The Fountainhead and Atlas Shrugged

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to admit that I'm one of those people that thinks the dishwasher is a miracle

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: The myths that are created about the South, about the way we grew up, about black people, are wrong

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly have some very strong libertarian leanings, yes

Quote.Author: Clarence Thomas
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a religious environment, and I'm proud of it

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: You may hate gravity, but gravity doesn't care

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no single right answer or path forward, but there is one right way to frame the problem

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is an unending stream of extenuating circumstances

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not be deceived by impostors

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have healed the sick by the power of the God. I have spoken with the gift of tongues

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an optimistic person

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: Venture capital is always wanting to go up market

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: For 300 years, higher education was not disruptable because there was no technological core

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: People under-invest in family because it doesn't pay off until the long term

Quote.Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote.QuoteValue: When you improve your product so it does the customer's job better, then you gain market share

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to continue to stand with the people that are being oppressed

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot of things that need to change. One specifically? Police brutality

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm here to play football

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't look at film that closely about my mechanics of where's my elbow at

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going to do something, you're going to do it to be the best

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in pressure. The pressure is not being prepared for what you want to do

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the biggest part of my game that's underestimated is the mental part of it

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't play for job security

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether football's here or not, I will be fine. I go out, I play to win

Quote.Author: Colin Kaepernick
Quote.QuoteValue: I love America

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have a dinosaur deep within us just trying to get out

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm handsome, no ands, buts or ifs

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: And if that isn't the truth, it would be a lie

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me liberty or a bran muffin!

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me liberty or give me a bran muffin!

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: I am such a pessimist that every project has surpassed what I envisioned

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a traveling practical joker. That's my line of work

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a dramatic writer takes hard work, talent, and discipline. And that's why I just make up crap

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm quite shy. Really. I'm trying to expand myself as a person more, get involved with people

Quote.Author: Colin Mochrie
Quote.QuoteValue: This just in: Beverly Hills 90210, Cleveland Browns 3

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of learned men think people really are the food they've eaten

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no reason to be the richest man in the cemetery. You can't do any business from there

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not too proud of having my name associated with some of my restaurants

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: The food I've liked in my time is American country cookin'

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't be against things so much as for things

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, my recipes are priceless

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: I've read hundreds of cookbooks. For my money, they are the bird

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm against retiring. The thing that keeps a man alive is having something to do

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't fear that a man will wear out as quickly as he will rust out

Quote.Author: Colonel Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: Sitting in a rocker never appealed to me. Golf or fishing isn't as much fun as working

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: When all else fails there's always delusion

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Fish recognize a bad leader

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: There are few things more liberating in this life than having your worst fear realized

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: If life gives you lemons, make some kind of fruity juice

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate cynicism - it's my least favorite quality and it doesn't lead anywhere

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Early on, they were timing my contract with an egg timer

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an abacus at home

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep cool my babies

Quote.Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Your path at 22 will not necessarily be your path at 32 or 42

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: We need a common enemy to unite us

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: We will continue to work together in our common fight against terror

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are going up the corporate ladder or the government ladder, you have to take some risk

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: The day has to come when it's not a surprise that a woman has a powerful position

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: I could read music before I could read

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Americans are not guilty for 9/11; I think President Bush is not guilty for 9/11

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't afford to leave Afghanistan to the Taliban and the terrorists

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been in enough positions to respect people with different views

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: Today's headlines and history's judgment are rarely the same

Quote.Author: Condoleezza Rice
Quote.QuoteValue: There was no silver bullet that could have prevented the 9/11 attacks

Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend

Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: I really just want to be warm yellow light that pours over everyone I love

Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot of optimism in changing scenery, in seeing what's down the road

Quote.Author: Conor Oberst
Quote.QuoteValue: Why are you scared to dream of god when it's salvation that you want?
